frontmatter.description: IBM Fusion HCI is a hyperconverged appliance that makes it easy to deploy enterprise ready OpenShift in your data center.

internal.content:
---
title: Fusion HCI
description: IBM Fusion HCI is a hyperconverged appliance that makes it easy to deploy enterprise ready OpenShift in your data center.
tabs: [Overview, Resources]
---

import { ActiveServer, Build, HighlyAvailable, HighPerformanceComputing, ProcessAutomation, SystemsDevopsProvision } from '@carbon/pictograms-react';

<PageDescription>

Fusion HCI provides a fully integrated turnkey platform for running and maintaining all of your on-premises Red Hat OpenShift applications.

</PageDescription>

> A hyperconverged bare metal appliance that makes it easy to get up and running quickly with OpenShift.

<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="Quick deployment"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://medium.com/@bjrandal.dev/deploying-an-enterprise-grade-bare-metal-openshift-cluster-in-less-than-a-week-ad17b5a307d0"
    bodyText="Deploy an enterprise-level OpenShift cluster in less than a week."
    >
    <ActiveServer aria-label="Appliance" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Orchestrated install"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/d9f49c0eda6c"
    bodyText="Automated OpenShift installation removes overhead of provisioning."
    >
    <ProcessAutomation aria-label="Automation" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Proven architecture"
    actionIcon=""
    bodyText="No need to design, build, test, and maintain a custom architecture for an on-prem deployment."
     >
     <Build aria-label="Automation" className="my-custom-class" />
    </SquareCard>
</Row>

![Components of the appliance](/images/hci-hardware.jpg)

<PageDescription>

Designed from the ground up as an integrated system for delivering resilient OpenShift.

</PageDescription>

<Row className="square-card-group">
  <SquareCard
    title="Private cloud in a box"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://medium.com/@ganshug/hosted-control-plane-with-red-hat-multicluster-engine-and-hypershift-621b6e1ee7f8"
    bodyText="Host multiple OpenShift clusters in a single appliance.  Provision clusters on demand."
    >
    <SystemsDevopsProvision aria-label="Provision" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="Enterprise ready"
    actionIcon="launch"
    href="https://community.ibm.com/community/user/storage/blogs/venkat-kolli/2023/05/05/introduction-to-fusion-resiliency-for-applications?CommunityKey=e596ba82-cd57-4fae-8042-163e59279ff3"
    bodyText="Highly available storage and networking protect against hardware failures.  Built in backup and disaster recovery capabilities protect against data loss or site outages."
    >
    <HighlyAvailable aria-label="Highly available" className="my-custom-class" />
  </SquareCard>

  <SquareCard
    title="High performance"
    actionIcon=""
    bodyText="High performance compute, GPUs, storage, and network."
     >
     <HighPerformanceComputing aria-label="High performance" className="my-custom-class" />
    </SquareCard>
</Row>

#####  

<PageDescription>

Watch the video

</PageDescription>

<iframe width="2452" height="1158" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/JijBTRyiw0I" title="IBM Storage Fusion HCI System Overview" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
